audioText: Si vous mourez dans cette démission, vous mordrez votre lèvre de regret pour le reste de l'éternité.
question: What will happen if you die in this resignation?
options: You will bite your lip with regret for all eternity
You will lose all your professional reputation permanently
You will disappoint your family and close friends deeply
You will miss all future career advancement opportunities
explanation: The correct answer is 'You will bite your lip with regret for all eternity'. The text states 'Si vous mourez dans cette démission, vous mordrez votre lèvre de regret pour le reste de l'éternité' - If you die in this resignation, you will bite your lip with regret for all eternity. 'Mourez' is the second-person plural present form of 'mourir' (to die), and 'lèvre' means 'lip'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - workplace resignation context
